tool_description: Calculates price elasticity of demand using historical price and sales data to determine price sensitivity.

historical_prices.description: Historical price points in chronological order

historical_quantities.description: Corresponding sales quantities for each price point

calculation_method.description: Elasticity calculation method: arc, point, regression

error_messages: Data length mismatch: historical_prices and historical_quantities must have same length
Insufficient data points: need at least 10 price-quantity pairs for reliable elasticity calculation
Invalid calculation method: use arc, point, or regression
Zero price values: historical_prices cannot contain zero or negative values
Invalid quantities: historical_quantities must be non-negative numbers
usage: Provide product_id with matching arrays of historical_prices and historical_quantities. Optionally specify calculation_method for different elasticity approaches.

r_squared.description: Statistical fit quality of elasticity calculation

optimal_price_range.description: Suggested price range for profit maximization
